com.camerontec.catalys.server.compliance

Class PercentageFromReferencePriceFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.compliance.ComplianceFilter
      • com.camerontec.catalys.server.compliance.PercentageFromReferencePriceFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComplianceFilter, IConfigurableContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PercentageFromBestPriceFilter, PercentageFromLastPriceFilter, PercentageFromMarketPriceFilter

    public abstract class PercentageFromReferencePriceFilter
extends ComplianceFilter
implements IConfigurableContainer
    PercentageFromReferencePriceFilter is a base implementation for a range of compliance filters that check that the order is no more than an specified percentage away from a reference price. The difference can be measured as an absolute value or a positive value. E.g., in the absolute case the filter is breached iff:
    abs(order-price - reference-price) / reference-price * 100 > limit

    In the positive case it is breached iff:

    (order-price - reference-price) / reference-price * 100 > limit
    . for a buy and iff:
    (reference-price - order-price) / reference-price * 100 > limit
    for a sell.
    Author:
    Tom Vasak, Hugh Emberson
